resources.string: This is your saved places panel, any location that you save will be automatically added to this list

"If an airline you're looking for is not listed or returned no results, please do not hesitate to send us an email and we'll try to see if it's possible to get flight data from the requested airline."

WeatherMate uses online webservices to lookup your flight data. Touch the magnifying glass to begin a new search. \n \n * Please Note: WeatherMate is not responsible for missing flight data, we pull this data from an online service and are not the aggregators of this data.
